Setting up a data source
The data source defines where the System receives data from
as part of a custom ETL process (for more information, refer to
Working with ETL
).
When configuring an ETL schema (for more information, refer to
Setting up an ETL schema
), you can specify the following sources:
The data structure of an ETL process is usually formed by the source. Use the
Settings
button to input the parameters of the source selected.
